name: Cube Color
description: "Cube Color" - a game in which you need to repaint more territory in the color of your cube. Compete against computer or friends who will take over the earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9800 GT Storage: 700 MB available space
